body.name: Coleshome 59" L Shaped Gaming Desk, Corner Computer Sturdy Home Office Table, Writing Larger Workstation, Vintage
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 7 hrs 56 mins
features: L-Shaped Corner Desk: The gaming computer desk fits nicely in a corner and maximizes your home office workspace perfectly. Allows you to take the advantage of your room corner as the best spot for work. The L desk is also a good choice to make it as your gaming workstation.

Large Size & Ample Space: 59"(L) x 47"(W) x 19"(D) x 28.9"(H). Large space for an l shaped computer desk, great choice for home office activity, gaming and writing work. Desk Height: 28.9". Plenty of legrooms for rest and for storage. This l shaped desk is equipped with CPU stand, which you can storage your computer tower perfectly.

High Stability & Super Sturdy: The legs of the L-shaped computer desk have two diagonal braces to ensure the stability, with an iron hook to hang your headphone. The strong steel frame ensures the maximum durability and stability, and can hold up to 220 lbs. Steel legs and adjustable leg pads keep the L shape table stable on uneven floors.

Easy to Assemble & Large Desk Panel: A detailed instruction manual and a screwdriver are provided. The desktop of the computer desk l shaped is made of MDF (Wooden Medium Density Fiberboard), which is waterproof and anti-scratch, very easy to clean.

Note: For a smooth assembly process, we suggest you keep a lite tightness for all the screws during assembly, after the whole corner gaming desk is assembled, firmly tighten all the screws. If you have any problem regarding our product, please contact us, our customer service team is happy to serve you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the desk
reviews.reviewText: This desk is a beautiful, heavy duty, quality product and is super easy to put together. All parts are clearly marked. A picture instruction sheet describes how to construct the desk very accurately. It is well worth the money. I wish I had purchased it a long time ago. I bought it on a Black Friday discount day and glad I did !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good size, looks nice. Very happy.
reviews.reviewText: This was definitely an improvement compared to what I was using before as a desk. I put it together myself the same day it came in. Wasn't too hard to follow the directions. I had a little trouble lining up the table top with the frame, and I realized I had some things backwards. So double triple check your bars because they all look similar but are not.There was no shortage of extra pieces like screws and bolts which was very much appreciated.I purchased the 66in desk. It fit nicely in the corner of my office and the color is fresh. Unfortunately the only complain I have is the space below the desk where your computer tower would sit is a tad small. So my machine sits on my desk and I have utilized that shelf as a place of storage for important documents.I was also able to slide a separate file cabinet underneath the desk to help pull it all together. Overall I am pleased and it would definitely be something I'd buy again if I needed to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After set up, desk is nice and sturdy. Instructions were confusing for a little bit. There were a few extra pieces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks very nice
reviews.reviewText: I liked how easy it is to assemble, it looks very nice in my son's room. It's so spacious just like the pic and description say

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tons of space, great value option for replacing an old desk
reviews.reviewText: I got this to replace an oldschool desk with a pull-out drawer, and the difference was night and day.You get a ton of space with this desk, and you can surround yourself with monitors and gadgets and still have space leftover for a plate of food and a drink!The little side-piece for holding your computer is just a hair too small for a full-size tower case, but you can work around that by getting bigger feet for the computer or using a slightly larger board there.My only complaint is that you have to be extremely careful during some of the middle steps of construction -- there are a few long supports that can hang down, and I actually had one of the screw sockets pop off while I was building it -- the one I had trouble with was rusted and was probably doomed for failure, but I got a replacement unit and had no issues afterwards!All in all, this is a fantastic value for anyone looking to get a snazzy new desk with a ton of space without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've put together a lot of cheap furniture from amazon, and the assembly can be a nightmare. Especially coming from china where they don't always do the best translations on budget products. This desk was incredibly quick and easy to put together, the instructions were very concise, and there was also an included QR code to scan for users to watch a video of the desk being assembled for extra visual aide. Other users complained about cosmetic damage from shipping, so it can probably be a bit of a gamble but at this price point I felt comfortable rolling those dice and I'm pleased to say it arrived without a scratch on any of the boards. Despite only weight 45 pounds when assembled, the desk is extremely sturdy, it does not wobble, shake, creak or bend with a full desktop setup and array of items strewn across the top. Here's my one complaint: I have my extremely large and heavy PC tower on the little shelf underneath the desk and it supports it just fine, although I did find that one of the legs (labeled the U piece in shipping and in the instructions) is far shorter than the other three legs and did not reach the floor without a support I added. Had I not been able to find an adequate solution to this, the weight of the PC tower may have broken shelf without four points of contact, who knows. It was an odd oversight to be sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price, misleading images
reviews.reviewText: So for the price I got it for, I really have no complaints since it is sturdy, easy to assemble, and has plenty of space. The PC shelf is a bit too shallow for my desktop, leaving about 3/4 inch hanging off. Assembly-wise, it took about an hour to build, including me needing to spin parts around after almost finishing, so it was pretty quick. There was also no damage whatsoever, which is something I was see many others encountered.Now, the images shown in the listing are wayyyy different, showing a matte black desk that is at least twice the thickness of the one I got. It’s a solid 3.5 desk on its own, but since I can’t do half a star and the images are obviously misleading, it gets a 3.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not made the strongest of wood. Pressed. But hold my 3 monitor and rest of office equipment perfectly. I have my printer where the old time PC would go. Out of the way, easy to reach.
Great desk, not flimsy, very sturdy holding my pc and 32 inch monitors!

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice product but not happy with the shipping time it took.
reviews.reviewText: Really nice and strong computer desk for dual monitor setup and gaming. I like the product very much. Only shipping time was a concern but finally got the product after one month of waiting. Assembly took some 90mins and required some tinkering work.
